member.name: T:Nums.dvec2
member.summary: A 2 component vector of double

member.name: F:Nums.dvec2.zero
member.summary: The zero vector: A vector where all components are equal to zero.

member.name: F:Nums.dvec2.unitx
member.summary: A unit vector pointing in the positive x direction. →

member.name: F:Nums.dvec2.unity
member.summary: A unit vector pointing in the positive y direction. ↑

member.name: F:Nums.dvec2.one
member.summary: A vector where all components are equal to one.

member.name: F:Nums.dvec2.x
member.summary: The x component is the first index of the vector

member.name: F:Nums.dvec2.y
member.summary: The y component is the second index of the vector

member.name: P:Nums.dvec2.sum
member.summary: The sum of the vectors components. x + y

member.name: P:Nums.dvec2.bytesize
member.summary: The number of bytes the vector type uses.

member.name: P:Nums.dvec2.length
member.summary: The magnitude of the vector

member.name: P:Nums.dvec2.sqlength
member.summary: The squared magnitude of the vector. sqlength is faster than length since a square-root operation is not needed.

member.name: P:Nums.dvec2.normalized
member.summary: The normalized version of this vector.
